CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Negotiation stage positioned above or below the Initial Inquiries stage?
SRP.A: The Negotiation stage is positioned {below} the Initial Inquiries stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Sale Closed?
VE.A: The value of stage Sale Closed is {51}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Viewed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Viewed is {205}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-sale Survey?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-sale Survey is {41}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Inquiries, with a value of {335}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-sale Survey, with a value of {41}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey?
SC.A: Decreased by {10} Properties from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Inquiries to stage Property Viewed?
SC.A: Decreased by {130} Properties from stage Initial Inquiries to stage Property Viewed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 102? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Inquiries} stage has {335}, the {Property Viewed} stage has {205}, the {Negotiation} stage has {129}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 102? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Contract Signed} stage has {75}, the {Sale Closed} stage has {51}, the {Post-sale Survey} stage has {41}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 63 and 167? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {129}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {75}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to {Negotiation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, or from stage Sale Closed to Post-sale Survey?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Contract Signed} to {Sale Closed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, or from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to stage {Negotiation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Inquiries} and {Property Viewed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Sale Closed} and {Post-sale Survey} stages.
